td.content: s:43 year old white female presents with moderate flushing, moderate intermittent abdominal distension and pain, Cancer x 4 weeks. pt also reports chronic moderate diarrhea. denies any smoking she drinks at least 4 beers a day o:Height 170 cm, Weight 70.5 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16, Skin = facial flushing, Skin = scattered facial telangiectasias a:Small Bowel Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to oncology.

s:pt c/o 4 days h/o moderate flushing, moderate intermittent abdominal distension and pain and moderate diarrhea. NKDA. patient is a 43 YO white F. Patient does not smoke consumes more than 4 alcoholic drinks daily o:Height 170 cm, Weight 70.1 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 15, Skin = facial flushing, Skin = scattered facial telangiectasias a:Small Bowel Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Laparotomy and resection - small bowel.

td.content: s:patient presents with moderate nausea and moderate abdominal pain. she is having symptoms 8-9 times a week, in spite of treatment. she is a 43 YO white f. o:Height 170 cm, Weight 72.1 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 17, eyes = dilated pupil, Abdomen = non tender, non distended, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Nausea p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to gastroenterology.

s:43 YO white female retail sales clerk presents with 9 days history of moderate abdominal pain and moderate nausea. o:Height 170 cm, Weight 71.9 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 17, eyes = dilated pupil, Abdomen = non tender, non distended, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Nausea p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Abdominal X-Ray.

s:patient with C/O moderate diarrhea, moderate flushing and moderate intermittent abdominal distension and pain. pt is a 44 year old white female retail sales clerk. she is a chronic alcoholic Patient does not smoke o:Height 170 cm, Weight 70.7 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 15, Skin = facial flushing, Skin = scattered facial telangiectasias a:Small Bowel Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Oxaliplatin - 85 mg/m2 IV, Leucovorin - 200 mg IV, FLUOROURACIL - 500 mg bolus, and ordered CT Abdomen.
